## What are CNNs?

Neural networks designed for grid-like data (images).

## Key Properties

- Spatial hierarchy
- Translation invariance
- Parameter sharing

## Applications

| Domain | Use Case |
|--------|----------|
| Vision | Object detection |
| Medical | Image diagnosis |
| Autonomous | Self-driving |

> ğŸ’¡ CNNs revolutionized computer vision!

slides.title: CNN Layers
slides.content:
# CNN Layers ğŸ”§

## Convolutional Layer

- Apply filters/kernels
- Detect features (edges, shapes)
- Learnable weights

## Pooling Layer

- Reduce dimensions
- Max or Average pooling
- Translation invariance

## Fully Connected

- Classification at end
- Flatten spatial features

| Layer | Purpose |
|-------|--------|
| Conv | Feature detection |
| Pool | Downsampling |
| FC | Classification |
